statement: Experienced software developer with five years of expertise in diverse programming languages and strong problem-solving skills, eager to contribute to innovative and challenging projects.

techStack.summary: Skilled in web development and software engineering, I specialize in creating dynamic applications and robust backend solutions across multiple platforms.

educationHistory.summary: Holder of a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science with a strong foundation in frontend development, backend solutions, and experience in robotics.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.capstoneDescription: Hocobot is a personal home companion robot that will greatly help us in things we do. From checking weather condition, looking for an answer on internet, finding things on web and even surveillance of the house. He is equipped with different sensor to detect the conditions of the surrounding and Artifical Intelligence that help him in decision making. We use microprocessor instead of micro-controller for better machine learning capabilities.

workHistory.summary: Junior Programmer at Arbitrage Inc., built an attendance system and backend. At Salary.com, worked on front-end development and site upgrades. Now a Software Developer at Bastion Inc., handling front-end, mobile apps, various web projects, and backend tasks.
